Collaborate with other YouTubers: One way to gain more subscribers and views is to collaborate with other popular YouTubers in your niche. This can be done by creating joint videos, hosting joint live streams, or even just mentioning each other in your videos.

Create engaging content: The key to making a popular YouTube channel is to create content that is engaging and entertaining. This can be done by using creative editing techniques, incorporating humor, or creating visually stunning videos.

Engage with your audience: Building a loyal following on YouTube is all about engaging with your audience. This can be done by responding to comments, asking for feedback, and creating polls or Q&A sessions.

Utilize social media: Promote your YouTube channel on other social media platforms to reach a wider audience. This can be done by sharing your videos on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and other platforms.

Invest in quality equipment: Investing in quality equipment can make a big difference in the quality of your videos. This can include a high-quality camera, microphone, lighting, and editing software.
